Title: v4.3.17 Preview
Content: Preview version for desktop is available on github. It features: Articles&News, Top Anime now has 8 categories and Hamburger menu received some lifting. Tell me what you think!

Title: Articles
Content: Next in queue are Mal articles, development is progressing smoothly and I have them working more or less. Screenshots on github :)

Title: Top anime - missing images.
Content: MAL has changed how those images are loaded in html, fix on monday. Sorry for inconvenience.

Title: v4.2.3.0 preview!
Content: Due to random storms randomly trying to fry my computer I did not manage to finish this update today as I planned. I have previews though, which are available on github. Help me test them out!
